field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the name of the file.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter a description for the file

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Author
field.required: You must enter at least the author.
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item in the form Lastname, Firstname [i.e. Smith, Josh or Smith, J].

field.label: Affiliation
field.hint: Enter the affiliation of the author as stated on the publication.

field.label: Orgunit name
field.required: You must enter at least the Orgunit name.
field.hint: Enter the name of the Orgunit of this item

field.label: Orgunit id
field.hint: Enter the id of the Orgunit of this item

field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item.

field.hint: Enter the names of the orgunit of this item.

relation-field.hint: Select the journal related to this volume.

field.hint: Enter the name of the journal volume

field.label: Editor
field.required: You must enter at least the author.
field.hint: The editors of this publication.

field.hint: Enter the affiliation of the editor as stated on the publication.

field.label: Project

field.label: Date of Issue

field.label: Authors

field.label: Editors

field.hint: Select the type of content of the item.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Part Of
field.hint: The publication where this publication is included. E.g. a book chapter lists here the book, a contribution to a conference lists here the conference proceeding.

field.label: ISBN (of the container)
field.hint: The ISBN of the book/report if it was not found in the system

field.label: DOI (of the container)
field.hint: The DOI of the book/report if it was not found in the system

field.label: Journal or Serie
field.hint: The journal or Serie where this publication has been published

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: ISSN
field.hint: The journal or Serie ISSN if it was not found in the system

field.label: Review of
field.hint: The publication object of the review

field.label: ISBN (of the reviewed item)
field.hint: The ISBN of the reviewed item if it was not found in the system

field.label: DOI (of the reviewed item)
field.hint: The DOI of the reviewed item if it was not found in the system

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the name of any sponsors.

field.label: Volume
field.hint: If applicable, the volume of the publishing channel where this publication appeared

field.label: Issue
field.hint: If applicable, the issue of the publishing channel where this publication appeared

field.label: Start Page
field.hint: If applicable, the page where this publication starts

field.label: End Page
field.hint: If applicable, the page where this publication ends

field.label: Projects
field.hint: Enter the name of project, if any, that has produced this publication.

field.label: Conference
field.hint: Enter the name of the conference where the item has been presented, if any.

field.label: Dataset or product
field.hint: Link the item to one or more existent dataset in the repository used or described by the publication or, put here the dataset citation

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the name of any sponsors.

field.label: Title
field.required: You must specify a title for the patent
field.hint: The title of the patent

field.label: Approval Date
field.hint: The Approval date. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Registration Date
field.hint: The registration date of the patent. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Inventor(s)
field.hint: The inventor: The actual devisor of an invention that is the subject of a patent.

field.label: Holder
field.hint: The holders of this patent

field.label: Issuer
field.hint: The issuer of the patent: the patent office

field.label: Patent Number
field.hint: The patent number.

field.label: Patent Number
field.hint: The patent number.

field.label: Type
field.required: You must select a patent type
field.hint: Select the type of content of the patent.

field.label: Application Number
field.hint: The Application number.

field.label: Date filled
field.hint: The date Filled.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the country and its language.

field.label: Subject Keyword(s)
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the description of the patent.

field.label: Originates From
field.hint: Enter the name of project, if any, that has produced this patent.

field.label: Predecessor
field.hint: Patents that precede (i.e., have priority over) this patent

field.label: References
field.hint: Result outputs that are referenced by this patent

field.label: Preferred Name
field.required: You must enter least at the Surname.

field.label: Qualification
field.required: You must enter at least the qualification title.

field.label: Education
field.required: You must enter at least the education title.

field.label: Site URL
field.required: You must enter at least the site url.
